column2: PAPABEAR THIS IS ECHO BLACK. PROVINS IS SECURE. I REPEAT WE HAVE PROVINS. OVER.
PAPABEAR THIS IS CHARLIE BLACK. FIGARI HAS FALLEN. OVER.
PAPABEAR THIS IS BRAVO BLACK. CHOTAIN IS CAPTURED. OVER.
ROGER THAT ECHO BLACK. WE CONFIRM PROVINS HAVE BEEN CAPTURED. OVER.
COPY THAT CHARLIE BLACK. CHECK FOR FIGARI. GOOD JOB. OVER.
AFFIRMATIVE BRAVO BLACK. CHOTAIN IS SECURE, KNOWLEDGED. OUT.
PAPABEAR TO ALL FORCES. GOOD JOB OUR MISSION IS COMPLETED. ALL ENEMIES ARE EITHER DEAD OR FLEEING, EXCELLENT JOB! PAPABEAR OUT.
